nodes.documentation:
@dev Library used to query support of an interface declared via `IKIP13`.

 * Note that these functions return the actual result of the query: they do not
`revert` if an interface is not supported. It is up to the caller to decide
what to do in these cases.
nodes.name: KIP13Checker

nodes.documentation: @dev Returns true if `account` supports the `IKIP13` interface,
nodes.name: _supportsKIP13
_supportsInterface

nodes.documentation:
@dev Returns true if `account` supports all the interfaces defined in
`interfaceIds`. Support for `IKIP13` itself is queried automatically.

     * Batch-querying can lead to gas savings by skipping repeated checks for
`IKIP13` support.

     * See `IKIP13.supportsInterface`.
nodes.name: _supportsAllInterfaces
_supportsKIP13Interface
_callKIP13SupportsInterface
